task.title: How to multiply numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions on how to use the multiply feature on the JPS Calculator app.

taskbody.prereq: To multiply numbers, you must know what is multiplication.
taskbody.result: The result from the multiplication displays.
taskbody.example:
Let's say you want to multiply 10 by 12. The equation will look like: 10 × 12=120. You enter 10. Press multiply (×). Enter 12. Press equals.
The result 120 appears on the screen
